Class SpeechBubble

public class SpeechBubble
extends greenfoot.Actor

Simple speech bubble notification. TODO: draw the speech bubble base on font metrics. See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1524855/how-to-calculate-the-fonts-width TODO: Resize the speech bubble based on text width and height (set max values for each).
